## SignalProviderProps type

Props for the SignalProvider component.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type SignalProviderProps = {
    svc: SignalSvc;
    children: ReactNode;
};
```
**References:** [SignalSvc](../signalsvc/)

## Example


```tsx
import { createSignals } from '@lattice/signals';

const props: SignalProviderProps = {
  svc: createSignals()(),
  children: <App />
};
```
